articles.title: US and EU avert trade war with 15% tariff deal
articles.description: The United States and the European Union have reached a framework trade agreement imposing a 15% import tariff on most EU goods, averting a larger trade war. The deal includes significant EU investments in the US and increased purchases of American energy and military equipment.

articles.title: Thousands in Greece and Turkey evacuate as winds and heat fan wildfires
articles.description: Thousands have been forced to evacuate in Greece and Turkey as wildfires, driven by strong winds and extreme heat, continue to spread. Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis praised rescue workers for their efforts and assured support for those affected.

articles.title: A 'random' stabbing at a Michigan Walmart left 11 injured, officials say. Here's what we know so far
articles.description: At least 11 people were injured in a stabbing attack inside a Walmart in Traverse City, Michigan. The suspect has been taken into custody, and authorities are investigating the incident.
